properties.name: Cape Town
properties.description: http://www.sagoclubs.co.za/cape-town-club/ , A Touch of Madness, 12 Nuttall Road. Under new management. The club will meet there for now, but will review. , Tuesday evenings from 19h00 , edit: https://goclubdb.herokuapp.com/club/976/

properties.name: Durban Go club
properties.description: (info date: May 2006) Peter Charter is at work resuscitating the Durban Go club.  Meetings: at the Steers on North Beach, on Tuesdays. , Start 18h30 on Tuesdays , Peter Charter (cellphone: 082 900 1496) or Tony Clulow (home phone: 031 702 1749). , edit: https://goclubdb.herokuapp.com/club/977/

properties.name: Joburg
properties.description: http://www.sagoclubs.co.za/joburg-club/ , Rosebank Mall – Fourno’s Bakery (Sunday mornings) Rosebank Mall – Mugg and Bean (Tuesday evenings) , Sundays (regularly) from 10:00 to 13:00 (approximately). Tuesdays (occasionally) from 19:00 to 21:00 (approximately). , edit: https://goclubdb.herokuapp.com/club/978/

properties.name: Mossel Bay
properties.description: There is currently no club in Mossel Bay. However, anyone there interested in the game can contact Candice Barker. She would be happy to meet and play holiday-makers or business visitors in Mossel Bay, introduce the game to prospective new players, or meet other players from Mossel Bay and surrounds. , ad hoc , Candice Barker (phone: 0446905547) , edit: https://goclubdb.herokuapp.com/club/979/

properties.name: Port Elizabeth
properties.description: http://www.sagoclubs.co.za/other-clubs/ , There are no clubs in the Eastern Cape. However, anyone there interested in the game can contact William Mapham <william.mapham@gmail.com> or Patrick Lee <alobar@telkomsa.net> , edit: https://goclubdb.herokuapp.com/club/980/

properties.name: Pretoria Clearwater
properties.description: House of Coffees in Clearwater Mall , Start 19h00 on Wednesdays , Pablo Casado (e-mail: phmcasado !@! gmail [d-o-t] com) , edit: https://goclubdb.herokuapp.com/club/982/
